TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchResult extends System.Object

summary.span: 类可封装在通过 进行搜索期间返回的、Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的节点。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

summary.span: 从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构检索与 相对应的 。

span.span: Retrieves the that corresponds to the from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用当你想要查看的实时项而不是通过返回的条目，或当你想要返回的对象上调用方法。Use when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through , or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned. > [!NOTE] > 调用每个通过返回可能会很慢。Calling on each returned through can be slow. ## Examples 下面的示例是中的示例一段摘录。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 原始示例创建一个新具有所需的路径和使用对象方法以启动搜索。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. 在执行搜索之后, 该示例使用方法来检索搜索结果中标识的活动目录项。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. ```vb ' Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. Dim myDirectoryEntry As DirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry() Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Newline + "The name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + _ "directory entry that corresponds to the " + _ "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, myDirectoryEntry.Name) ``` ```csharp // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry(); Console.WriteLine("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + "directory entry that corresponds to the " + "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", myDirectoryEntry.Name); ``` ```cpp# // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry^ myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult->GetDirectoryEntry(); Console::WriteLine( String::Concat("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' ", "directory entry that corresponds to the ", "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n"), myDirectoryEntry->Name); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性唯一地标识 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的此条目。The property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 始终可以使用此路径检索条目。The entry can always be retrieved using this path. ## Examples 下面的示例是中的示例一段摘录。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 原始示例创建一个新具有所需的路径和使用对象方法以启动搜索。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. 在执行搜索之后, 该示例使用方法来检索搜索结果中标识的活动目录项。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. 此示例演示如何分析从搜索结果的属性。This example shows how to parse the property from the search result. ```vb Dim mySearchResultPath As String = mySearchResult.Path Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, mySearchResultPath) ``` ```csharp string mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult.Path; Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search " + "result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ``` ```cpp# String^ mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult->Path; Console::WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As ResultPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取此对象的属性的 集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for this object.

value.span: 在此对象上设置的属性的 。
